DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Early Steroid Withdrawal Long-Term Steroid Maintenance Therapy Kidney Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Patient post kidney transplant day 37 requirement dialysis Exclusion : Patient receive kidney HLA identical , live donor Patient multiorgan transplant recipient Patient pregnant lactating . Female patient child bering potential must negative pregnancy test agree practice effective birth control
